channel.title: Heath class stupid?
channel.description: Seriously, they tell you not to have sex to prevent STD's, But they don't make it illegal for people not to have sex like under the age of 21 or 18. I think the only reason that is, is because there were people who actually cared, now the only reason they "care" is for the money. Is everything for the money these days ?

item.title: Heath class stupid?
item.dc:creator: @vbcoderx vbcoderx
item.description:
@vbcoderx wrote:

[quote=“reVein, post:10, topic:229815”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=302417.msg2428158#msg2428158 date=1220713990]
You people are retarded.
[/quote]rep++[/quote]

wtf? spam much… Lol i took health in 8th grade, only half a semester… and half the time, there were other people in the class teaching… people from some stupid organization trying to teach us about STDs and about how sex is bad. Lol, the first one, got offended or some shit from some comment someone made, and spent like a week lecturing us about how Sexual Harassment is bad, and that she was authorized to report you for it… we were laughing at her, the whole time… it was seriously hilarious. Even the coach, who was the teacher of the class thought it was hilarious… btw, having your football coach as a teacher is fucking WIN, he favors you so much, and you have to barely any work…

Read full topic

item.title: Heath class stupid?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Erm… have you never heard of the Age of Consent?

It is what you are describing, and it already exists. The age varies based on state, but there aren’t many states in the world without one.

item.title: Heath class stupid?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Think about it, if they did make it illegal for under 21s to have sex do you seriously think anyone would follow that law?

Right, and nor would there be a way to prevent it.

Same with how it works now, its illegal for under 16s in the UK to have sex, yet they hand out condoms to people of any ages practically.
